title: Flipped Learning-Based Nursing Practical Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Real-time online education in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment, strengthening practical competencies through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can independently acquire and apply core nursing practice concepts through flipped learning stages.
Learners can enhance critical thinking and collaboration skills for real clinical scenarios through PBL (Problem-Based Learning).
Learners achieve at least 85% proficiency in core nursing procedures (e.g., blood pressure measurement, infection control) through quizzes and feedback sessions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
